ai-patthana7.6:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 4.)
ai-patthana7.6:1.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. ...
ai-patthana7.6:2.1_0: Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. ...”
ai-patthana7.6:4.1_0: With the ending of the eight parts they gain for a proliferation. ...
ai-patthana7.6:4.1_1: Before sitting down to the four directions ...
ai-patthana7.6:4.1_2: The eighth day of the lunar half-month.
